alert.note: Alert for Carter; Johnson; Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 4:15AM CDT until March 25 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sullivan County in east Tennessee... Johnson County in east Tennessee... Carter County in east Tennessee... The City of Bristol in southwestern Virginia... Southern Washington County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 615 AM EDT. * At 515 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bristol Va to 7 miles south of Banner Hill, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Mountain City, Walnut Hill, Glade Spring, Damascus, Roane Mountain State Park, Neva and Laurel Bloomery. This includes the following highways... Interstate 81 in Tennessee near mile marker 75. Interstate 81 in Virginia between mile markers 1 and 33. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
